programme.title: Inner Tube
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E17, Doug lies to Carrie about having to work late so he can play mud football and get out of going to her seminar.

programme.title: Papa Pill
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E18, Doug feels sorry for Arthur and lets him go to a bar instead of a dance at his senior center. When Carrie finds out she gives Doug full control of Arthur, and Doug realizes how hard it is to deal with him.

programme.title: Package Deal
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E19, Doug receives an offer from FedEx and tells his IPS boss that if he wont give Doug a better route than he will transfer to FedEx.

programme.title: Seperation Anxiety
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E20, During Deacon and Kelly's separation, Doug and Carrie go out with Kelly and run into a guy, Bill, Carrie knows from work.

programme.title: Departure Time
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E21, Doug's parents are coming in town so Doug and Carrie decide to go and pick them up at the airport and they bring upsetting news to Doug.

programme.title: Swim Neighbors
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E22, After a big storm Doug and Carrie catch their annoying neighbors in their backyard cleaning up. Then they give the idea to Doug and Carrie that they should tear down the wall dividing them and make it on big backyard.

programme.title: S'no Job
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E23, Danny's father Stu asks Doug to arrange a job interview for Danny at IPS. Doug however doesn't want Danny to work with him.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (1)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E24, Carrie discovers that she's pregnant, and she's panicked that the timing is wrong. Meanwhile, Deacon and Kelly begin to reconcile.

programme.title: Pregnant Pause (2)
programme.desc: King of Queens, S03E25, Doug tells Carrie not to panic about having the baby, that he will take care of all her "burden," so he takes on a second job so that they can store a little extra money before the due date.

programme.title: Walk, Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E01, In an effort to spend more time with Carrie, Doug hires someone (Nicole Sullivan) to take Arthur for a walk three times a week.

programme.title: Sight Gag
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E02, Doug uses a two-for-one coupon to give Carrie a gift of corneal surgery which results in her temporary blindness.

programme.title: Mean Streak
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E03, Doug prepares to break the record for the most consecutive deliveries without incident; Arthur asks Holly to play in Scrabble tournament.

programme.title: Friender Bender
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E04, Doug and Carrie's friendship with Deacon and Kelly is tested after Doug is distracted and backs into their car.

programme.title: No Retreat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E05, Arthur is left to fend for himself when Doug and Carrie go on her company retreat with a group of boring lawyers.

programme.title: Ticker Treat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E06, Doug's Halloween decorations put Arthur in the hospital; Deacon doesn't like Kirby's choice of a Halloween costume.

programme.title: Lyin' Hearted
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E07, Doug runs into a business acquaintance while bringing Arthur to the hospital for heart surgery; Carrie discovers an old college acceptance letter.

programme.title: Life Sentence
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E08, Doug and his friends become victims of reality TV when Doug sets up a camera in the basement to keep an eye on Arthur.

programme.title: Veiled Threat
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E09, Doug and Carrie experience a flashback to their wedding day after finding a piece of wedding cake in their freezer.

programme.title: Oxy Moron
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E10, Doug tries to prove he would protect Carrie in a life-or-death situation after he makes a dumb move while on a rough plane ride.

programme.title: Depo Man
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E11, Carrie asks Doug to be a witness at her boss's trial, but then fears he won't be professional in the courtroom.

programme.title: Ovary Action
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E12, The holidays and Doug's parents descend on the household as Doug and Carrie attempt to conceive a baby.

programme.title: Food Fight
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E13, Carrie grows jealous when Spence's girlfriend (Christine Nelson) recruits Doug to test her culinary homework.

programme.title: Double Downer
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E14, Doug spoils Carrie's plans for a romantic weekend when he organizes an outing to Atlantic City -- and his boss ends up joining them.

programme.title: Dougie Nights
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E15, Doug becomes addicted to the night life after he agrees to go club hopping with Deacon to help snap him out of his depression.

programme.title: No Orleans
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E16, Doug and Carrie sneak off to New Orleans after having promised his cousins they would never travel there without them. Peter Scolari guest stars.

programme.title: Missing Links
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E17, Carrie and Doug try to find a date for Deacon so they can all golf together as a foursome at the country club.

programme.title: Hero Worship
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E18, Doug's uncle (guest star Gavin MacLeod) offers financial backing when Doug expresses a desire to open a sandwich shop.

programme.title: Screwed Driver
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E19, Doug starts acting like a child when Carrie goes on a business trip and his parents come for a visit.

programme.title: Lush Life
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E20, Doug tries to get Carrie drunk so he can cheat on his diet, but things get out of hand. Lou Ferrigno guest stars.

programme.title: Bun Dummy
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E21, Doug hates Carrie's new hairstyle but can't bring himself to tell her the truth; Spence dreads an upcoming reunion with a former teacher.

programme.title: Patrons Ain't
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E22, When their accountant makes them feel guilty about their lack of charitable donations, Doug and Carrie decide to make a large donation to a school library.

programme.title: Eddie Money
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E23, Doug tries to keep $5,000 in gambling winnings a secret from Carrie, who didn't want him betting to begin with; Carrie is offered a new job. Eddie Money guest stars.

programme.title: Two Thirty
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E24, When Doug goes to Dr. Farber (Tim Matheson) for a root canal, he finds out Carrie used to have a major crush on the dentist.

programme.title: Shrink Wrap
programme.desc: King of Queens, S04E25, Carrie and Doug send Arthur to a psychiatrist (William Hurt), to whom he reveals his relationship with his father (Ben Stiller).

programme.title: Window Pain
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E01, Carrie becomes obsessed with trying to convince the new neighbors that she and Doug don't constantly fight.

programme.title: Arthur, Spooner
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E02, Team leader Carrie grows frustrated with her drab work group; Doug begins relying on Arthur's company in order to fall asleep.

programme.title: Kirbed Enthusiasm
programme.desc: King of Queens, S05E03, Doug agrees to try out for a semiprofessional football league if Kirby will stay with peewee football.

programme.title: Cliff's Rocky Moment
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E16, A man in the bar becomes sick of Cliff's obnoxious know-it-all behavior and challenges him to a fight. Will Cliff shut up, accept the challenge, or run away?

programme.title: Fortune and Men's Weight
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E17, Coach brings fortunes to Cheers when he buys an antique scale.

programme.title: Snow Job
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E18, Diane forbids Sam to go on an annual ski trip with his buddies.

programme.title: Coach Buries a Grudge
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E19, Coach is hurt when he learns that his deceased friend once propositioned his wife.

programme.title: Norman's Conquest
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E20, Norm tries to prove his manliness when his new client makes advances.

programme.title: I'll Be Seeing You (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E21, Sam hires a brilliant artist to paint Diane as a peace offering.

programme.title: I'll Be Seeing You (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S02E22, Diane defends her relationship with Sam to a slandering artist.

programme.title: Rebound (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E01, In the aftermath of their explosive separation, Sam has fallen off the wagon with a thud and has returned to his playboy ways, while Diane has just returned from a self-imposed rest at Golden Brook Sanitarium.

programme.title: Rebound (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E02, After several sessions with Dr. Frasier Crane, Sam is getting his life back in order, so Diane feels it's time to tell him the truth about her relationship with the psychiatrist.

programme.title: I Call Your Name
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E03, Sam gloats when he has reason to believe that Diane is still in love with him.

programme.title: Fairy Tales Can Come True
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E04, Frasier asks Sam to escort Diane to an event while he is out of town.

programme.title: Sam Turns The Other Cheek
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E05, Sam reaps the consequences of getting involved with a married woman.

programme.title: Coach In Love (Part 1)
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E06, Coach proposes marriage when he falls in love at first sight.

programme.title: Coach In Love (Part 2)
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E07, After Coach's girlfriend Irene wins the lottery, she becomes a socialite and breaks up with him.

programme.title: Diane Meets Mom
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E08, Frasier's mom threatens Diane's life when they meet for the first time.

programme.title: An American Family
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E09, Carla's ex-husband returns with his new bride, demanding custody of their oldest son. The normally feisty Carla shocks everyone at the bar when she agrees to the request.

programme.title: Diane's Allergy
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E10, After moving in with Frasier, Diane develops a chronic allergy and believes his beloved dog, Pavlov, causes it.

programme.title: Peterson Crusoe
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E11, Norm decides to live life to the fullest when he gets back his medical test results.

programme.title: A Ditch In Time
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E12, At the bar, Sam's innocent flirtation with an attractive customer, Amanda, gets him into trouble when he doesn't realize she's a member of Diane's therapy group.

programme.title: Whodunit
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E13, Carla wins the favor and admiration of Frasier's esteemed mentor.

programme.title: The Heart Is A Lonely Snipe Hunter
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E14, The guys pull a cruel joke on Frasier while they're on a fishing trip.

programme.title: King Of The Hill
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E15, Sam volunteers to play in a charity softball game against Playboy Playmates.

programme.title: Teacher's Pet
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E16, Sam gets Coach's help to help him pass a geography class and get his high school diploma. But he eventually finds an easier way to pass the course.

programme.title: The Mail Goes To Jail
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E17, Norm jeopardizes Cliff's job when he covers his route for a day.

programme.title: Bar Bet
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E18, An old bet forces Sam to choose between getting married or losing Cheers.

programme.title: Behind Every Great Man
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E19, An astute reporter visits Cheers and is turned off by Sam's arrogance.

programme.title: If I Ever Would Leave You
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E20, Nick returns to win back Carla's love when his new wife leaves him.

programme.title: The Executive's Executioner
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E21, Norm's forced to take a promotion that entails firing employees.

programme.title: Cheerio Cheers
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E22, With much trepidation, Diane decides to leave Cheers and travel to Europe with Frasier, who has been offered a temporary position at the University of Bologna.

programme.title: The Bartender's Tale
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E23, Carla hires an Englishwoman to fill Diane's place while she's in Europe.

programme.title: Bells Of St. Clete's
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E24, Carla takes revenge on her despised former high school principal.

programme.title: Rescue Me
programme.desc: Cheers, S03E25, In a cliff-hanging season finale, Frasier proposes to Diane while in Europe, wanting to get married the very next day.

programme.title: Birth, Death, Love And Rice
programme.desc: Cheers, S04E01, Frasier returns to Cheers with news that Diane joined a convent.

programme.title: Shore To Shore
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Shore To Shore, S02E04, Our seafaring nature has translated well to the space age, seeking to sail out into the unknown in search of riches of one kind or another.

STAR LIGHT, STAR BRIGHT, S05E01, The two current science missions to our star; the sun have made great leaps forward in the science of how stars work, how they generate solar winds and how they affect their orbiting planets

programme.title: Edge of The Universe
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Edge of The Universe, S01E10, The night sky is a time machine. The further we look out into the universe the further back in time we reach.

programme.title: Borderland / Mars: Red Dawn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E15, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Rocky Shores / Silent Partner
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E14, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Night Fire
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Night Fire, S02E05, The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful; they tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

programme.title: Milky Way
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Milky Way, S04E01, This episode traces our view of the Milky Way, from the mythology of ancient sky watchers to the efforts of scientists to map it from the inside out.

programme.title: Shooting Gallery: Asteroids and Comets / Galactic Visions: Alien Worlds
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E18, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: The Giant Planets: Lords of Gravity / Outer Limits: Edge of the Solar System
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E16, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Landsat
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Landsat, S04E06, Take a look at Landsat 8, the advanced planetary explorer with a 900 million dollar price tag! It is designed to peer across multiple wavelengths to reveal complex and ever-changing details that are undetectable by the human eye.

programme.title: Seasons of Saturn
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Seasons of Saturn, S03E01, Saturn is the second largest planet and has an astonishing 60 moons in its orbit. Thanks to the Cassini mission, it's also one of the most studied and most photographed planets in our neighborhood.

programme.title: Hubble's Renaissance
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Hubble's Renaissance, S02E01, Before we can reach space, we must first be able to see it. Hundreds of years ago, the simple telescope was used to give us a seemingly closer vantage. Today, we use the awe-inspiring, and super powerful, Hubble Space Telescope.

programme.title: Hidden Havens: Icy Moons / Icy Gems: Frozen Moons
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas, S01E17, See the sun, moon, planets, and galaxies through the eyes of intrepid machines that are blazing a trail across the solar system. A gateway to bold adventures, these cameras are delivering spectacular new cosmic vistas.

programme.title: Virtual Universe
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Virtual Universe, S02E06, Our understanding of the cosmos is limited by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately, computer simulations can help us see how galaxies interact over millions of years, and even how dark matter structures the universe.

programme.title: Stargazer's Paradise
programme.desc: Cosmic Vistas: Stargazer's Paradise, S02E04, The Atacama desert is a perfect place for watching the night sky. With still winds and only a handful of cloudy nights each year, it allows scientists to get the absolute most out of their tools.

programme.title: Mars: Adapt Or Leave
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Mars: Adapt Or Leave, S02E05, As the latest successes and failures come and go Mars continues to give up her secrets.

programme.title: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS
programme.desc: The New Frontier: PEERING INTO THE ABYSS, S05E09, Imaging a black hole was a breakthrough in astronomy, now with the new satellite IXPE high energy telescope we will be looking at some of the most dramatic, and most violent objects in the universe: Colliding Black holes and Neutron Stars.

RISING TIDES, S05E03, The next generation of Earth observation satellites are now in place maintaining the continuity of long-term climate data, in particular the planets rising temperatures and related ocean levels.

programme.title: Planet X
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Planet X, S04E04, The New Horizons mission continues deeper into space, it’s next target looming close.

programme.title: The Dark Side
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Dark Side, S02E10, Perhaps that American politician was right. There are indeed things we know we don’t know.

programme.title: Tickets Please
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Tickets Please, S04E03, No spacecraft have traveled so fast or so close to a star before. It is hoped to reveal the source of the solar winds that effect us here on Earth

programme.title: Martian Attractions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Martian Attractions, S04E07, The Latest in Martian exploration from orbit and on the ground, new sources of water and planetary dust storms are a few of the stories unfolding on to the Red Planet.

programme.title: Living In Space
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Living In Space, S03E01, How do astronauts cope with living in space? The unique environment, the lack of taste in their food and the smell of canned air all contribute to the stresses of living and working in space.

programme.title: The Ice Giants
programme.desc: The New Frontier: The Ice Giants, S01E06, Beyond the asteroid belt lay the ice giants, some can be seen with the naked eye, others only glimpsed once by a passing probe.

programme.title: Cosmic Collisions
programme.desc: The New Frontier: Cosmic Collisions, S03E08, Cosmic and x rays, these mysterious and highly powerful particles from deep space are being investigated to finally discover where they come from.

programme.title: What Is Space?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: What Is Space?, S01E01, Brian Greene reveals space as a dynamic fabric that can stretch, twist, warp, and ripple under the influence of gravity, and explores dark energy, which makes up 70% of the universe.

programme.title: The Illusion of Time
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: The Illusion of Time, S01E02, Brian Greene takes us on the ultimate time traveling adventure, hurtling 50 years into the future before stepping into a wormhole to travel back to Big Bang.

programme.title: Quantum Leap
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Quantum Leap, S01E03, Join Brian Greene on a wild ride into the weird realm of quantum physics, which governs the universe on the tiniest of scales.

programme.title: Universe or Multiverse?
programme.desc: The Fabric of the Cosmos: Universe or Multiverse?, S01E04, Cutting-edge theories are suggesting that our universe may not be the only universe. Instead, it may be just one of an infinite number of worlds that make up the multiverse.

programme.title: Part 1
programme.desc: The Apollo Experience: Apollo 17: Part 1, S01E01, Between 1960 and 1972, mankind boldly went where no human had been before. Across 11 manned missions, 24 men flew to the moon and 12 walked upon its surface. This film documents Apollo 17 through the eyes of the astronauts who flew.

programme.title: Ronald
programme.desc: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole, 20240930110000 +0000, In 1999, 17-year-old Ronald and two other teens seek retaliation for an alleged sexual assault, ultimately burning their victim alive in the woods of Fort Walton Beach, Fla.; now 36 years old, Ronald is granted a resentencing hearing.

programme.title: Otis
programme.desc: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole, 20240930120000 +0000, In 1998, 16-year-old Otis breaks into Valerie's home and allegedly tries to rob her, shooting her and her 16-year-old daughter; sentenced to life without parole, Otis is later granted a resentencing hearing and hopes he can someday be released.

programme.title: The Malvo Effect

programme.desc: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole, 20240930135900 +0000, Shelton Jackson was 17 when he was sentenced to life in prison without parole for the murder of Thomas Maynard, who tragically left behind a week-old baby boy.

programme.desc: Kids Behind Bars: Life or Parole, 20240930145900 +0000, Richard Kinder was 17 when he and a friend committed a robbery that ended in a young woman's death and the serious injury of her boyfriend; now 65, Richard has served nearly 50 years of a life-without-parole sentence.

programme.title: Mistaken Identity
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E01, A man hires a killer to bump off his wife, but instead, he kills another woman with the exact same name.

programme.title: Counter Punch
programme.desc: Bizarre Murders, S01E06, A Washington man hires a sleazy amateur hitman to kill his wife. And when she turns the tables on her attacker, the gaping holes in their master plan are revealed.

programme.title: Freemont Bomber
programme.desc: Forensic Factor, S01E13, In one violent evening, a series of bombs rock the sleepy California city of Fremont. The targets include both the Chief and Ex-Chief of police. Can authorities and forensic scientists stop the Fremont Bomber before he strikes again?

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Forensic Factor, S01E18, Four brutal murders in one bloody weekend devastate the small town of Barrie, Ontario. The prime suspects are on the loose. But while police conduct a massive manhunt, they begin to discover that the evidence isn't adding up.

programme.title: Bloodbath in the Bottoms
programme.desc: Murder Chose Me, S02E01, A vicious shooting leaves three friends dead in Shreveport.

programme.title: The Yellow House on Kent St.
programme.desc: Murder Chose Me, S02E06, Police find the body of a murder victim behind the wheel of a wrecked SUV.

programme.title: The Cover Up/Bad Seed
programme.desc: The First 48, S13E15, In Cleveland, a man is shot dead in an empty courtyard. A mysterious 911 call leads Detectives Ignatius Sowa and Raymond Diaz on the hunt for an elusive killer.

programme.title: When A Stranger Calls / Sweet 16
programme.desc: The First 48, S14E04, In Dallas, an elderly woman is beaten and strangled in her home. When the victim's missing bank card starts being used detectives follow the trail hoping it will lead to her killer.

programme.title: Bound and Burned
programme.desc: The First 48, S14E10, When an expectant father is found bound and burned in a creek bed, Dallas Det. Scott Sayers must unravel a deadly robbery plot, to identify his suspects and bring them to justice.

programme.title: The Murder of Rachel Manning
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S01E101, In 2000, Rachel Manning was found murdered and the suspects were convicted, however the convictions were overturned 7 years later. With new advances in forensics, the true culprit is finally caught.

programme.title: The Craigslist Killer
programme.desc: Trace of Evil, S01E106, The story of how police managed to stop a most unlikely killer, who appeared to be embarking on a bold crime spree, and how digital forensics, and good old fashioned police work led to arrest.

programme.title: Tina
programme.desc: Cruise Ship Killers, S02E12, An on again/off again couple go on a week long cruise to try and rebuild their relationship. All is well until the unthinkable happens and one of them goes missing overboard. Was it a terrible accident or was it cold blooded murder?

programme.title: Debra
programme.desc: Cruise Ship Killers, S02E03, A millionaire widower and her teenaged daughter take a five-star cruise together. But at one of the many stops along the way, a grizzly discovery is made when crew members find the widower's body crammed into her own suitcase.

programme.title: Wrong Place, Deadly Time
programme.desc: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen, S02E02, Anthony Lee used to be a well-known drag queen in Tampa's nightclubs. But while cooking dinner at his friend Tiffany's house, he's gunned down by an angry intruder as Tiffany hides in the bathroom. The motive will lead Chris Hansen to uncover his killer.

programme.title: Murder at Yale
programme.desc: Killer Instinct with Chris Hansen, S02E06, Yale University medical researcher Annie Le is about to get married, but she vanishes on her way to her lab. The frantic search for her turns into a nation-wide sensation. Now, for the first time on TV, Chris Hansen reveals what really happened to her.

programme.title: Under One Roof/Off Target
programme.desc: The First 48, S12E05, In Dallas, a grandfather is robbed and murdered in his bedroom. Det. Scott Sayers has to figure out who would have bludgeoned him to death for a 26-inch TV.

programme.title: Shattered

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E23, The brutal stabbing murder of a Florida woman is solved when police find crucial DNA evidence in spit left on the pavement. And a man is put away for rape and murder when his footprint matches the footprint he left at the crime scene 18 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E20, DNA found on a marijuana joint in Florida in 2005 helps to solve the 1988 rape and murder of a California woman. And a cold case of murder in Illinois heats up when a jailhouse lawyer turns jailhouse snitch.

programme.title: Lone Survivor
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E27, In early 1984, three-year-old Vanessa Bennett becomes the lone survivor of her family's brutal murder. Initial investigators suspect a serial killer is at large, but decades pass before DNA narrows the suspect pool to one man.

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E10, In 1984, a 15-year-old girl is found murdered in her grandparents' home. For decades, a stalled investigation only fuels the town rumor mill, pointing an accusing finger at her 13-year-old sister.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S01E14, In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs. And in California, police track down two boys who enjoy satanic rituals and setting fires.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: The Cuff Link/The Unluckiest Man
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E11, Police solve an old murder case with a painstaking examination of the tool mark on the plastic flex cuff that bound the victim's hands, and a 15-year-old murder case is finally cracked open.

programme.title: Queen of the Ozarks
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E21, In June 1985, a 20-year-old "Sucker Day" Festival Queen is found brutalized. The small community of Nixa, Missouri, is certain her blood is on the hands of a local wealthy businessman, but after 25 years DNA reveals the true killer.

programme.title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E06, A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession. Her body was later found floating in a drainage canal. At the time, a key witness hinted that a member of the Catholic clergy may have been responsible.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic: Cold Case Files Classics, S02E26, Best of the Year Marathon: Serial Killers

programme.title: A is for Arson
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E23, Firefighter Gary Parks is killed in a fire ruled arson, the investigation into his death shifts to homicide. A serial arsonist is thought to be the culprit.

MST3K: I Accuse My Parents, 19930904000000 +0000, A young man gets mixed up with a crime syndicate and blames his inattentive parents. The 1940s-era documentary short explains the then-new techniques that enabled farmers to rush produce to market.
MST3K: Invasion Of The Neptune Men, 19971011000000 +0000, Our heroes discover just how boring an alien attack on Tokyo can be when they view an anti-vehicle for Sonny Chiba.
MST3K: Invasion U.S.A., 19940723000000 +0000, A group of barflies must figure out what to do when the Soviets attack the U.S. in Invasion USA (1952)
Laserblast, 19960517000000 +0000, A teenager discovers a laser weapon left behind by turtle-like aliens. He uses it for petty revenge, but the weapon slowly changes his personality.
MST3K: Mad Monster, 19891202000000 +0000, Things get hairy on the Satellite of Love thanks to the lupine antics of The Mad Monster (1942) and the second chapter of Radar Men from the Moon (1952).

MST3K: Master Ninja I, 19920111000000 +0000, The crew watch a ninja and a drifter save an airport from thugs in "Master Ninja I" while building a model muscle car and experimenting with their ninja skills.

programme.title: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary: Big Changes
programme.desc: Backlot: MST3K 25th Anniversary, S01E15, Part three of the complete history of MST3K takes a look at the changes the series underwent throughout the course of its run, including the host and network shifts.

Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders, 19990917000000 +0000, A grandfather tells his grandson several horrifying stories involving the wizard Merlin and a stolen monkey doll in Merlin's Shop of Mystical Wonders (1996).

programme.title: What to Do on a Date
programme.desc: MST3K Shorts, S01E108, Nick wants to take Kay out on a date, but isn't sure what they'd do. The short offers ideas like taffy pulls and scavenger sales. Nothing says romantic quite like a scavenger sale.
MST3K: Operation Kid Brother (Operation Double 007), 19700101000000 +0000, A plastic surgeon (played by Neil Connery, brother of Sean), the brother of a secret agent, combats villain Thair Beta.
MST3K: Parts: The Clonus Horror, 19970607000000 +0000, Scientists run a clone farm for VIPs while Pearl and her goons are forced into babysitting omnipotent Space Children.
Home by Spring, 20180101000000 +0000, Hallmark Original Movie. An event planner goes undercover as her boss to plan the perfect retreat.
I Do, I Do, I Do, 20150206000000 +0000, An architect (Autumn Reeser) relives her disastrous wedding day over and over until she faces her fears and discovers what she really wants in life.

Once Upon a Winter's Date, 20210214000000 +0000, Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. A plank is discovered in the mine, Jack Thornton tries to discover the owner.

programme.title: Cease and Desist
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. All the widows in Coal Valley receive eviction notices from the Coal Company.

programme.title: A Telling Silence
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth helps a mute student who is struggling to cope with death.

programme.title: Secrets and Lies
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Schoolteacher Elizabeth and Constable Jack's relationship starts to heat up.

programme.title: Starting Over... Again
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E01, Hallmark Original Series. Like mother, like daughter!

programme.title: Running Scared
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E02, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's Heritage Festival gets everyone in town talking.

programme.title: Do the Right Thing
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E03, Hallmark Original Series. Trouble is brewing after Cassie's mystery guest Ashley goes missing.

programme.title: All in the Family
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E04, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's mischievous cousin Abigail is back in Middleton.

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's magic can't keep her away from Abigail's scheming.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. A blizzard threatens disaster in Middleton.

programme.title: Together We Stand...
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. The winter storm continues to pose a threat to all of Middleton.

programme.title: Phantoms
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E09, Major Leonard's team fails to check in with Atlantis while on a mission. Following the energy readings in hope of finding Major Leonard and his men, McKay leads the team into a cave to discover that the cause the energy spike is a Wraith generator.

programme.title: The Return (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E10, The now awakened Ancients meet with O'Neill and Woolsey, thanking them for taking care of the city but also asking them to vacate Atlantis. While Ronon and Teyla stay in the Pegasus galaxy, the rest struggle to resume their lives on Earth.

programme.title: The Return (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S03E11, O'Neill and Woolsey, the lone survivors of the replicators' bloody coup, hide out in an abandoned section of the city. Knowing Landry has an order to nuke Atlantis if a foothold situation should ever arise, the two lay low awaiting their fate.

programme.title: Visitation
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E09, With no recollection of how they got to the Destiny, crew members left behind over a year earlier make a mysterious return. After an unsettling turn, the memories stirred through regression therapy prove disastrous for those who’ve returned.

programme.title: Resurgence
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E10, In the hopes of finding something beneficial, the crew follows an energy signature that leads them to a mysterious sea of lifeless ships. With no visible signs of danger, the crew set off to take a closer look. But things may not be what they seem.

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E11, Locked in a battle with a Drone Command Ship, the Destiny is surprised by the arrival of the aliens that abducted Rush and Chloe. After Destiny's position is revealed, the crew again comes under heavy attack. But this time, they have a plan.

programme.title: Twin Destinies
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S02E12, Excitement spreads through the ship as Eli believes he’s found a way to dial Earth. But Dr. Rush has serious reservations about abandoning Destiny, and when the crew is interrupted by a distress call, it may just change the plans of the Destiny.

programme.title: Rules Of Engagement
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E09, SG-1 lands in the middle of a blazing battle between some Stargate soldiers and a Jaffa army. Believing the soldiers to be the missing-in-action SG-11 team, O'Neill and the others provide assistance… until the mystery team turns its weapons on SG-1!

programme.title: Forever In A Day
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E10, During a rescue of captured Abydonians, Daniel finds his missing wife, Sha're. But instead of greeting him, she attacks him - leading to her death at the hands of Teal'c. Distraught over her death and angry at Teal'c, Daniel quits Stargate Command.

programme.title: Past And Present
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E11, SG-1 encounters an entire planet suffering from amnesia. The planet's leader, a woman named Ke'ra, returns to Earth with SG-1 to find a cure. But as Ke'ra and Daniel develop a mutual attraction, SG-1 suspects she may not be who she appears to be.

programme.title: Jolinar's Memories
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E12, Carter's father has been captured on a moon transformed into hell. No one but Jolinar has ever escaped from hell, so Tok'ra technology is used to access Jolinar's memories from Carter's mind…but not before an old foe shows up to foil the mission!

programme.title: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E13, During a rescue attempt, SG-1 is caught by one of hell's denizens, who is determined to use the information they have to overthrow Goa'uld lord Sokar. Using Tok'ra technology, the team is forced to relive painful memories…but how much can they take?

programme.title: Foothold
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E14, During routine medical exams, Dr. Fraiser injects each team member with a sedative. Teal'c awakens and sees General Hammond conspiring with Fraiser and two aliens. What has happened at Stargate Command, and can SG-1 overpower its own allies?

programme.title: Pretense
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E15, When SG-1 is invited to planet Tollan to attend a Triad ceremony, they are shocked to discover it is actually a trial to determine the fate of their friend Skaara. Daniel and O'Neill must argue a case against a mysterious Goa'uld to save Skaara.

programme.title: Urgo
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E16, En route to a planet, the SG-1 are implanted with an alien spore that evolves into a being called Urgo. Though Urgo claims to be friendly, the suspicious team members work feverishly to rid themselves of the creature before it destroys their minds.

programme.title: A Hundred Days
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E17, SG-1 visits the friendly planet Edora and gathers to watch the annual meteor shower that lights up the sky like a fiery rain. But suddenly, wayward asteroids bombard the planet, destroying the Stargate. Can O'Neill and the team ever return home?

programme.title: Shades Of Grey
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S03E18, On a mission to Tollana, O'Neill steals a weapon there and takes it back to Earth. When Hammond discovers the deception, he suspends O'Neill. But O'Neill's misconduct is only the beginning of a deep mystery that could have catastrophic consequences.

programme.title: Summer Storm
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E003, Dylan, injured in a surfing incident, stays with the Walshes during his recovery - until Jim Walsh kicks him out for kissing Brenda!

programme.title: Anaconda
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E004, After an illegal late-night poker game, Brandon and Dylan clash over a break-in at the beach club.

programme.title: Play It Again, David
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E005, Kelly is mortified when her mother starts dating David's father and plots to break up the new couple.

programme.title: Camping Trip
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E007, The gang heads up to Yosemite on what turns out to be a totally doomed camping trip.

programme.title: Ashes To Ashes
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E009, An effort to create a neighborhood security patrol goes horribly awry resulting in race hate and violence.

programme.title: Necessity Is A Mother
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E010, When Dylan's long-absent mother moves back into his life - not to mention into his home - things come to a head, forcing Dylan to confront his issues not only with his mother, but with himself as well.

programme.title: Leading From The Heart
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E011, Brandon and Brenda's paraplegic cousin Bobby is visiting Beverly Hills - and Kelly finds him extremely interesting!

programme.title: Down And Out Of District
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E012, Andrea wins a high-school journalism contest, but her victory is marred by a school district investigation.

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E013, The gang goes to a Halloween party, but things take a turn for the worst when Kelly's seductive costume catches the eye of a college student whose intentions are less than honorable.

programme.title: U4EA
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E015, Emily invites everyone to a secret party at an underground club - where she does something that could end her relationship with Brandon forever.

programme.title: My Desperate Valentine
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E016, Emily refuses to accept the fact that Brandon no longer wants to see her and spirals out of control - and Brenda's the only one who might be able to talk her down.

programme.title: Fire And Ice
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E019, Brandon makes a connection with an aspiring figure skater that could melt ice - but is banned from seeing her by her overprotective coach.

programme.title: A Competitive Edge
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E020, Andrea launches a campaign to create awareness about AIDS and other STDs at West Beverly and finds herself going up against some powerful opponents.

programme.title: Everybody's Talkin' 'Bout It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E021, Kelly's loose lips let slip an explosive secret that almost destroys her mother's relationship with Mel.

programme.title: And Baby Makes Five
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E022, Dylan's attempts to help a friend through AA put a serious strain on his relationship with Brenda.

programme.title: The Pit and The Pendulum
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E024, Brandon's father becomes involved in a lucrative real estate deal - until Brandon discovers that if the deal goes through, Nat will lose the Peach Pit.

programme.title: Meeting Mr. Pony
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S02E025, A robbery at the Peach Pit leaves Brenda more traumatized than she's willing to admit - especially when she must identify her attacker in a police lineup.

programme.title: Runaway Car/Snowgirl

programme.title: To Everything There is a Season
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E05, Mitch's mother arrives in town for a visit, and after some strange occurrences, he insists she sees a doctor. Meanwhile, Cody loses the motivation to continue his Olympic training and it is up to Stephanie to reinspire him.

programme.title: Leap of Faith
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E06, Stephanie, CJ, and Caroline go on a girls-only junior lifeguard trip to Catalina which turns dire when two of the girls get trapped in a flooded cave. Meanwhile, a woman who dies in a car accident bequeaths an odd inheritance to Mitch…

programme.title: Face of Fear
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E07, Hobie's new friend Isaac is an angry kid who will do anything to get his father's attention. His risky behavior is a problem for the lifeguards. Meanwhile, Caroline meets a jockey who has lost the will to race after an accident.

programme.title: Hit and Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E08, Logan borrows Cody's car without permission and has an accident, then lies to the police. Meanwhile, the Baywatch team settles an internal dispute with a paintball war and C.J. takes in an injured sea lion, causing problems with her roommates.

programme.title: Home is Where the Heat is
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E09, Matt Brody returns to Baywatch and ends up trapped on a yacht with Neely when a group of ruthless pirates takes hostages. Meanwhile, Joey's past may jeopardize her adoption by Mitch.

programme.title: Sweet Dreams
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E10, Logan and Caroline’s relationship hits a new low when Caroline returns his engagement ring, but things change when a baby is left in Logan’s possession. Meanwhile, Cody must overcome yet another setback to his Olympic career.

programme.title: The Incident
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E11, Caroline blames herself for a teen's death in a fiery nighttime boating accident and goes through Critical Incident Stress. Pushing everyone away, Caroline begins partying to distract from her guilt. Can the team help her recover from her PTSD?

programme.title: Beauty and the Beast
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E12, A mysterious, unseen creature begins attacking beachgoers, and it is up to the Baywatch team to find the creature. Meanwhile, Inside Sports Magazine wants a lifeguard for their swimsuit issue. Neely and Caroline compete for the cover.

programme.title: Desperate Encounter
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E13, Logan must help his friend Carmen raise $50,000 to keep her ranch, and Jessie Lee Harris is back in town just in time to help. Mitch finds himself in a deadly race for justice during his vacation in Baja, Mexico.

programme.title: Baywatch Angels
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E14, Stephanie, Caroline, and CJ become Charlie’s Angels in a fun fantasy romp through 70's television as they try and catch an escaped psychopath bent on killing lifeguards.

programme.title: Bash at the Beach
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E15, CJ rescues pro wrestler Hulk Hogan, who then tells the Baywatch team that he's in town with Randy Savage to try and prevent the closure of the Venice Boys' Youth Center. Hogan must take on Ric Flair in a cage match to prevent the closure.

programme.title: Freefall
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E16, Mitch is convinced by Stephanie's boyfriend Tom to go sky-surfing. Things go horribly wrong when Mitch's parachute fails to deploy! Back on the beach, CJ's lifeguarding duties are impeded when she begins dating a celebrity.

programme.title: Sail Away
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E17, Stephanie is recruiting lifeguards for the annual Sailing Regatta where they will compete against South Bay, and Neely is taking the competition very seriously. Meanwhile, Mitch finds out Joey has grandparents who want to care for her.

programme.title: Lost and Found
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E18, Mitch and Caroline rescue a woman who gets amnesia falling off the pier and must find her father to help her recover her memories. CJ meets a wheelchair-bound man who’s determined to get wheelchair access across the beach to the water.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E19, The team is invited to Hawaii for a week to oversee new lifeguard techniques and relax a bit. Logan becomes obsessed with competing in a surfing competition. To avoid a curse, CJ and Stephanie must return a sacred lava rock to its original location.

programme.title: Forbidden Paradise, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E20, After Matt is stung by a poisonous fish, he and Mitch find a village where a young woman offers to help them, resulting in all three of them running from her jealous suitor. Logan’s selfish behavior puts his relationship with Caroline in jeopardy.

programme.title: Last Wave
programme.desc: Baywatch, S06E21, Kaye is reunited with old flame Wes Masters. Stephanie undergoes surgery for melanoma performed by her doctor and boyfriend Tom, who plans a romantic surprise for her when surgery is over. Caroline catches Logan cheating on her with Neely.
